title: ADELAIDE based team looking for TOP and MID. PLAT+
body:
**ADELAIDE PEOPLE ONLY PLEASE.**

**Team Phalanx** is looking for a **Plat+** Top and Mid (and maybe Jungler). We attend LAN tournaments in Adelaide via the AGFA community but also will be entering online tournaments.

What we want and ask of all of our players is:
1. Clear communication
2. Great game knowledge
3. Ability to win lane in this snowball-infested meta

If you are interested, please add _PapaHuggey_ ingame. Thanks.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
